_header: All that ever gone and riden
_description: ‘þe Pater noster vndo on englissh’ — in couplets

NLS1921.First Lines:
Alle þat euer gon and ridenþat willeȝ godes merci
                    abiden…
NLS1921.Note:
135 lines, ends imperfectly, due to folio 72a being nearly completely
                    torn out (only a stub remains).
NLS1921.Attributed Title: Þe pater noster vndo on englissch (f. 72ra)
